title: Sampler, ca. 1830
medium:
Medium: cotton, linen
Technique: embroidery, needle lace, cut work on plain weave foundation
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased from Mercur Collection, cat. #168, Anderson Art Galleries, 1928.

description: White on white sampler with six floral borders of graded widths.
